name: Saguya, My Beloved
description:
You're a lonely man who don't got no friends. Until he comes across the divine drawing herself, Saguya. Once the man meets Saguya, his life changes forever...

Saguya, My Beloved Credits (can be found in the games files)

 Disclaimer: This game was made for fun and partially as a joke. If you don't like it, please do not hate on me. This is only my first project. If you hate on me, this may be my only project.
